snippet.title: Hitman World of Assassination: The Undying - Official Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
snippet.description:
Hitman has a new target -- and it's Sean Bean, one of the most killable actors. The Undying returns to the stealth action game. Watch the latest trailer for Hitman: World of Assassination for intel on Mark Faba, aka The Undying (played by Sean Bean). The Undying will be available in Hitman: World of Assassination from March 22 to April 21, 2024.

#IGNFanFest
